Hi,

I am just trying to run the supplied test sample code that comes with 
the JUnit distribution. I am using JUnit version 3.7 (from 
www.junit.org). I am using the instructions in the ReadMe file: java 
junit.textui.TestRunner junit.samples.AllTests 

Of course, I substitute jview instead of java, as I am using Visual 
J++.

Regards,

Krishna

--- In junit@y..., Hrishikesh <rushi_kesh@y...> wrote:
> can u provide me the code so that i can try to
> solve ur problem
> 
> 
> =====
> RISHIKESH
